enum.name: PARACHUTE_ACTION
enum.description: Parachute actions. Trigger release and enable/disable auto-release.

entry.name: MAV_DATA_STREAM_ALBATROS_1
entry.description: Albatros data where default send frequency 1Hz

entry.name: MAV_DATA_STREAM_ALBATROS_2_4
entry.description: Albatros data where default send frequency from 2 to 4 Hz

entry.name: MAV_DATA_STREAM_ALBATROS_4
entry.description: Albatros data where default send frequency 4Hz

entry.name: MAV_DATA_STREAM_ALBATROS_10
entry.description: Albatros data where default send frequency 10Hz

message.name: ALBATROS_2_4_MSG
message.description: Message that sends from 2 to 4 times per sec for Albatros
message.field: Current throttle setting in integer percent, 0 to 100
Battery current, in 10*milliamperes (1 = 10 milliampere), -1: autopilot does not measure the current
Consumed charge, in milliampere hours (1 = 1 mAh), -1: autopilot does not provide mAh consumption estimate
Timestamp of the component clock since boot time in milliseconds.

message.name: ALBATROS_10_MSG
message.description: Message that sends 10 times per sec for Albatros

message.name: ALBATROS_1_MSG
message.description: Message that sends 4 times per sec for Albatros
message.field: Altitude in meters in AMSL altitude, not WGS84 if absolute or relative, above terrain if GLOBAL_TERRAIN_ALT_INT
Remaining battery energy: (0%: 0, 100%: 100), -1: autopilot does not estimate the remaining battery
Vehicle heading (yaw angle) in degrees * 100, 0.0..359.99 degrees. If unknown, set to: UINT16_MAX
Wind direction (that wind is coming from).

message.name: ALBATROS_4_MSG
message.description: Message that sends 1 times per sec for Albatros
message.field: Altitude in meters, expressed as * 1000 (millimeters), AMSL (not WGS84 - note that virtually all GPS modules provide the AMSL as well)
Altitude above ground in meters, expressed as * 1000 (millimeters)
